titleStmt.title: A briefe exhortation to all men to set their houses in order. By William Iones B. of D. Preacher to the Isle of Wight
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, b. 1581 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones dwelling in Red-crosse streete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exhortation of all masters of families.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
